com.krobothsoftware.commons.network

Class RequestBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.commons.network.RequestBuilder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RequestBuilderAuthenticate

    public class RequestBuilder
extends Object
    Builder for requesting HTTP connections.

    Internally handled responses for response code

    301 Resends request with new Location
    302 Resends request with new Location. Only if followRedirects is true

    Use setInternalHandler(int, RequestHandler) to set an internal handler
    To ignore handling, use ignoreCode(int)

    Since:
    SNC 1.0
    See Also:
    NetworkHelper

      • execute

        public Response execute(NetworkHelper networkHelper)
                 throws IOException
        Sends HTTP request based on request builder. Connection is not closed.

        Execute process

        • Call ConnectionListener.onRequest(HttpURLConnection, RequestBuilder)
        • Open connection with proxy
        • Set HTTP Method, connection and read timouts, and follow redirects
        • Setup Cookies, Headers, and OutputStream
        • Open connection and get InputStream
        • Check ignored response codes, handle RequestHandler's
        • Store Cookies
        • Call ConnectionListener.onFinish(HttpURLConnection)

        Responses in current package based on status code
        First checks ResponseHandler.getResponse(HttpURLConnection, UnclosableInputStream, int, String)
        3xx ResponseRedirect.class
        401 ResponseAuthenticate.class
        OTHER Response.class
        Parameters:
        networkHelper - network helper for connection
        Returns:
        response depends on status code of connection
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • toString

        public String toString()
        Returns string in format "[method] : [url]".
